name: Specialty Supply
overview:
Specialty Supply is North Americaâ€™s leading supplier of MWD components, parts, and tools for oil and gas directional drilling and surveying. Their MWD products, including drill pipe screens, have a proven and unparalleled track record. Their parts are designed and built to hold up under even the most difficult on-site drilling conditions.

Measurement While Drilling, MWD, tools aid in downhole measurement collection and then route that quantitative data back to the surface for analysis. Timely and accurate measurements are a vital link in the process of directional drilling. Specialty Supply has earned its market dominance because they understand, first hand from both field and managerial experience, the importance of providing quality products and services right now. Even more, Specialty Supply understands the unique proprietary and design needs for individual clients. Leading oilfield technology companies around the world come to Specialty Supply. For reliability, functionality, performance, support, and availability; you can count on them.

Also consider their innovative design solutions for gyro, steering tools, MWD running gear, and drill pipe screens. Know they have what you need and they can offer expert tailoring and design options of their products to meet your special needs.
